content:
Hey,

the validator 5.1.22/5.1.23 is showing me errors, which were not present in the prior versions:

Error @ Bundle.entry[0].fullUrl (line 10, col62) : URL-Wert "http://test.local/fhir/PractionerRole/1010" löst nicht auf( does not resolve)
Error @ Bundle.entry[1].fullUrl (line 42, col60) : URL-Wert "http://test.local/fhir/Practitioner/1000" löst nicht auf
Error @ Bundle.entry[1].resource.ofType(Practitioner).identifier[0].system (line 64, col69) : URL-Wert "https://fhir.test.de/Codesystem/Test" löst nicht auf

even the flag assumeValidRestReference does not change anything.

Is it a bug?
sorry i can't access the examples right now...need to send tomorrow

@Grahame Grieve
example.zip
IGs are basisprofil-de-r4-master, final
Example is in example

Thanks
I have the same Issue here. I use a made up NamingSystem in my example Patient instance Identifer which used to work fine, now I get an error that the URL could not be resolved.

This could be a consequence of this bugfix:
Fix bug in unknown URL handling that could cause significant delays in validation (>1min / unknown URL) https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/releases/tag/5.1.22
@Grahame Grieve Do you have an idea already?
but my list is a mess after DevDays last week
